html.div:
This dashboard shows the number of compliant controls vs the total number of DfE Mandated Controls.
The data can either be displayed as an 'absolte' ie X of Y, or as a Percentage.

This dashboard shows the list of compliant and non-compliant controls for the specified service.
The top metric is the number of of DfE Mandated Controls that have passed the tests from the total number of DfE Mandated Controls The data can either be displayed as an 'absolute' ie X of Y, or as a Percentage.
If you want to change to looking at a different service then do this.....
The list of controls.....

This dashboard shows the details for the selected control
Compliance - These are the rules that were applied
Underlying Data - the fields in red are the ones which need remediation
Where the field in the Underlying Data is implementationStatus, the data will have come pre-cooked from Microsoft rather than being calculated within this app. So while the conclusions are reliable, there is no detail available about which users, etc.
